circumstances:
The airplane was shot down by a Hurricane and crashed into the sea off Luqa. All four crew members were killed. 
Crew:
Oblt Georg Lust, pilot, 
Ofw Bruno Stötzer, observer, 
Uffz Alfred Hechter, radio operator, 
Ogefr Wilhelm Steinkamp, air gunner.
probable_cause: Shot down by a British fighter.
